body:
(If anyone wonders, my old IGN was Speeded/Miunaa/Uruo, whatever sounds familiar to you guys)

If minecraft, what server (besides Avicus)?
If any other game, what game would it be?

atm i've been test streaming for a week and im able to stream minecraft and CSGO* (*i get median of 24-40 fps when streaming, but higher than 40 when not streaming) and despite being on a laptop, the stream quality is actually pretty good, im asking this cuz i wanna try get into streaming as a hobby, and i'll be graduating high school in over 2 months and my summer break would be going on for over 5 months before i enter college.

Twitch: twitch.tv/xiterracubist (i might get a new twitch account so it would fit my name if i were to stick to just minecraft due to my IGN)
